00024 size_t CPlayer::m_playerID = 0;

00026 ///
00027 // Initialization Part
00028 ///
00029 CPlayer::CPlayer(const char &Episode, short &Level, char &Difficulty,
00030      bool *mp_level_completed, stOption *mp_option,
00031      std::vector<CObject*> &m_Object, CMap &map) :
00032 CObject(&map, 0, 0, OBJ_PLAYER),
00033 m_episode(Episode),
00034 m_level(Level),
00035 m_difficulty(Difficulty),
00036 pjumpupspeed_decrease(g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings().player.defaultjumpupdecreasespeed),
00037 mp_levels_completed(mp_level_completed),
00038 mp_option(mp_option),
00039 mp_StatusScr(NULL)
00040 {
00041  m_playerID++;
00042  mp_object = &m_Object;
00043  canbezapped = true;
00044  m_index = 0;
00045 
00046  pjumping = PNOJUMP;
00047  pfalling = false;
00048  psemisliding = false;
00049  psliding = false;
00050  ppogostick = false;
00051  pslowingdown = false;
00052     m_playingmode=WORLDMAP;
00053 
00054 
00055  // Set every value in the class to zero.
00056     memset(&inventory, 0, sizeof(stInventory));
00057     setDefaultStartValues();
00058     setDatatoZero();
00059 }

00061 // Sets the player data to the initial value,
00062 // We also could put that in the init list of the constructor,
00063 // but it would be much longer...
00064 void CPlayer::setDatatoZero()
00065 {
00066  // When worldmap is set up, use that frame
00067  sprite = PMAPDOWNFRAME;
00068 
00069  performCollisions();
00070 
00071  m_type = OBJ_PLAYER;
00072  moveTo(0,0);
00073  ankhtime = 0;
00074     exists = true;
00075  onscreen = true;
00076  pfallspeed = 0,
00077  pdir = pshowdir = (m_level==80) ? DOWN : RIGHT;
00078  inhibitfall = hideplayer = false;
00079    pwalkframe = pwalkframea = 0;
00080     dpadcount = 0;
00081     hideplayer = false;
00082     mounted = false;
00083     ppogostick = false;
00084     pogofirsttime = false;
00085     plastfire = false;
00086     honorPriority = true;
00087     solid = true;
00088     bumped = false;
00089 
00090  
00091     pjumptime = 0;
00092     pjumping = PNOJUMP;
00093  
00094     mapplayx = mapplayy = 0;
00095     level_done = LEVEL_NOT_DONE;
00096 
00097     m_cheats_enabled = false;
00098     m_showStatusScreen = false;
00099  
00100     level_done_timer = 0;
00101    dpadcount = dpadlastcount = 0;
00102    beingteleported = false;
00103 
00104    // This will setup the proper frames, so second, third and fourth player get the correct sprites
00105     playerbaseframe = (m_index==0) ? 0 : SECOND_PLAYER_BASEFRAME+(m_index-1)*48;
00106  if(m_episode == 3) playerbaseframe--;
00107 
00108     // Set all the inventory to zero.
00109     memset(playcontrol, 0, PA_MAX_ACTIONS*sizeof(char));
00110 }

00112 // sets the lifes and some shots, and other stuff, depending what game it is.
00113 // NOTE: This must only be called once, per new game.
00114 void CPlayer::setDefaultStartValues()
00115 {
00116  CPhysicsSettings &PhysicsSettings = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00117     pdie = PDIE_DEAD; // At first time he is revived when map is started
00118  godmode  = false;
00119     inventory.extralifeat = 20000;
00120     inventory.lives = 4;
00121 
00122     inventory.charges = PhysicsSettings.player.start_with_shots;
00123 
00124  // start with pogo stick in all episodes but 1
00125  inventory.HasPogo = PhysicsSettings.player.pogostickonstart;
00126 }

00128 // This function should be called, when the worldmap starts or any level is started
00129 void CPlayer::setupforLevelPlay()
00130 {
00131  plastfalling = true;
00132  solid = true;
00133  pshowdir = RIGHT;
00134  ppogostick = false;
00135  pjumping = PNOJUMP;
00136     psliding = psemisliding = false;
00137     pfrozentime = 0;
00138     keyprocstate = 0;         // KPROC_IDLE
00139     pjustjumped = pjustfell = true;
00140     pfireframetimer = 0;
00141     psupportingobject = lastsupportingobject = 0;
00142  supportedbyobject = false;
00143    object_chosen = false;
00144     lastpogo = false;
00145    hintused = false;
00146    exitXpos = 0;
00147     pjustfell = false;
00148     plastfalling = false;
00149     pfalling = false;
00150     pwalking = playspeed = 0;
00151     xinertia = pinertia_y = 0;
00152     plastfire = pfiring = false;
00153     pwalkanimtimer = 0;
00154     inhibitfall = false;
00155    m_Level_Trigger = LVLTRIG_NONE;
00156    checkObjSolid();
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool CPlayer::scrollTriggers()
00160 {
00161  int px, py, left, up, right, down, speed;
00162  bool scrollchanged=false;
00163 
00164  Uint16& scroll_x = mp_Map->m_scrollx;
00165  Uint16& scroll_y = mp_Map->m_scrolly;
00166  
00167  if (pdie) return scrollchanged;
00168 
00169  px = (getXPosition()>>STC)-scroll_x;
00170  py = (getYPosition()>>STC)-scroll_y;
00171  
00172  st_camera_bounds CameraBounds = g_pVideoDriver->getCameraBounds();
00173  left = CameraBounds.left;
00174  up = CameraBounds.up;
00175  right = CameraBounds.right;
00176  down = CameraBounds.down;
00177  speed = CameraBounds.speed;
00178 
00179  // left-right scrolling
00180  if(px > right && scroll_x < mp_Map->m_maxscrollx)
00181  {
00182   do{
00183    px = (getXPosition()>>STC)-scroll_x;
00184    mp_Map->scrollRight();
00185   }while(px > right+speed && scroll_x < mp_Map->m_maxscrollx);
00186   scrollchanged = true;
00187  }
00188  else if(px < left && scroll_x > 32)
00189  {
00190   do{
00191    px = (getXPosition()>>STC)-scroll_x;
00192    mp_Map->scrollLeft();
00193   }while(px < left-speed && scroll_x > 32);
00194   scrollchanged = true;
00195  }
00196 
00197  // up-down scrolling
00198  if (py > down && scroll_y < mp_Map->m_maxscrolly)
00199  {
00200   do{
00201    py = (getYPosition()>>STC)-scroll_y;
00202    mp_Map->scrollDown();
00203   }while(py > down+speed && scroll_y < mp_Map->m_maxscrolly);
00204   scrollchanged = true;
00205  }
00206  else if ( py < up && scroll_y > 32  )
00207  {
00208   do{
00209    py = (getYPosition()>>STC)-scroll_y;
00210    mp_Map->scrollUp();
00211   }while(py < up-speed && scroll_y > 32);
00212   scrollchanged = true;
00213  }
00214 
00215  // This will always snap correctly to the edge
00216  while(scroll_x < 32)
00217   mp_Map->scrollRight();
00218  while(scroll_x > mp_Map->m_maxscrollx)
00219   mp_Map->scrollLeft();
00220  while(scroll_y < 32)
00221   mp_Map->scrollDown();
00222  while(scroll_y > mp_Map->m_maxscrolly)
00223   mp_Map->scrollUp();
00224 
00225  return scrollchanged;
00226 }
00227 
00228 // handles walking. the walking animation is handled by gamepdo_walkinganim()
00229 void CPlayer::Walking()
00230 {
00231  int cur_pfastincrate;
00232 
00233     if (inhibitwalking && !psliding)
00234     {
00235   if (!pfrozentime||m_episode!=1)
00236    if (!pjumping && !pfalling)
00237     xinertia = 0;
00238   return;
00239     }
00240  
00241     // this prevents a "slipping" effect if you jump, say, right, then
00242     // start walking left just as you hit the ground
00243     if (pjustjumped && ((xinertia > 0 && pdir==LEFT) ||\
00244                         (xinertia < 0 && pdir==RIGHT)))\
00245     {
00246      if(!ppogostick)
00247       xinertia = 0;
00248     }
00249  
00250     // this code makes it so that if you jump/fall onto a semi-sliding
00251     // block you'll start moving a little
00252     if (!pjumping && !pfalling)
00253     {
00254      pjustjumped = false;
00255   // on left/right press clear pjustjumped
00256   if ( (playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) || (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) )
00257   {
00258    pjustfell = 0;
00259   }
00260   
00261   // if we fall onto a semislide tile with no inertia
00262   // don't move!.
00263   if (pjustfell && psemisliding)
00264   {
00265    if (pdir==RIGHT)
00266    {
00267     if (blockedr)
00268     {
00269      pjustfell = 0;
00270     }
00271     else
00272     {
00273      pshowdir = pdir;
00274     }
00275    }
00276    else
00277    {
00278     if (blockedl)
00279     {
00280      pjustfell = 0;
00281     }
00282     else
00283     {
00284      pshowdir = pdir;
00285     }
00286    }
00287   }
00288     }
00289  
00290     // test if we're trying to walk
00291     if ((psemisliding && xinertia!=0) || (((playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) || (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) || (( (playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0) || (playcontrol[PA_Y] > 0)) && m_playingmode == WORLDMAP )) && !inhibitwalking))
00292     {
00293   // we just started walking or we changed directions suddenly?
00294   if (pwalking == 0 || ((lastpdir==RIGHT && pdir==LEFT)||(lastpdir==LEFT && pdir==RIGHT)))
00295   {
00296    pwalkanimtimer = 0;
00297    pwalkframe = 1;
00298    pwalkincreasetimer = 0;
00299    
00300    if (!pjumping && !pfalling)
00301    {
00302     if(!ppogostick) // Only if he stays on the ground (No pogoing)
00303      xinertia /= 2;
00304     pinertia_y = 0;
00305    }
00306    
00307    lastpdir = pdir;
00308    pwalking = 1;
00309   }
00310     }
00311     else
00312     {   // end "d-pad down and bit sliding"
00313      if(xinertia != 0)
00314       pslowingdown=1;
00315      else
00316      {
00317       pslowingdown=0;
00318       pwalking = 0;
00319      }
00320     }
00321 
00322  CPhysicsSettings &PhysicsSettings = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00323  int pmaxspeed = PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed;
00324 
00325  // when sliding on ice force maximum speed
00326  if (psliding)
00327  {
00328   if (pjumping != PPREPAREJUMP &&
00329    pjumping != PPREPAREPOGO)
00330   {
00331    // reset walk frame because we have no walk animation while on ice
00332    pwalkframe = 0;
00333    // keep player sliding at maximum speed
00334    if (pdir==RIGHT)
00335     xinertia = pmaxspeed;
00336    else if (pdir==LEFT)
00337     xinertia = -pmaxspeed;
00338   }
00339   return;
00340  }
00341  else if (!pwalking) return;    // don't run rest of sub if not walking
00342  // if we get here we're walking and not sliding
00343  
00344  // increase player inertia while walk key held down
00345  if (ppogostick)
00346         cur_pfastincrate = PFASTINCRATE_POGO;
00347  else
00348         cur_pfastincrate = PFASTINCRATE;
00349 
00350  if (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0 && !ppogostick)
00351  { // RIGHT key down
00352   // quickly reach PLAYER_FASTINCMAXSPEED
00353   if (pwalkincreasetimer>=cur_pfastincrate)
00354   {
00355    if(pfalling) xinertia+=(1<<2);
00356    //else xinertia+=(1<<4);
00357    else xinertia+=(1<<3);
00358    pwalkincreasetimer=0;
00359   }
00360   else pwalkincreasetimer++;
00361   
00362   // prevent sliding on map
00363   if ( m_playingmode == WORLDMAP )
00364   {
00365    if(xinertia < 0)  xinertia = 0;
00366    else xinertia = playcontrol[PA_X]*PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed/150;
00367   }
00368   
00369   // increase up to max speed every time frame is changed
00370   if (!pwalkanimtimer && xinertia < pmaxspeed) xinertia+=(1<<4);
00371  }
00372  else if (playcontrol[PA_X] < 0 && !ppogostick )
00373  {  // LEFT key down
00374   // quickly reach PFASTINCMAXSPEED
00375   if (pwalkincreasetimer>=cur_pfastincrate)
00376   {
00377    if(pfalling) xinertia-=(1<<2);
00378    //else xinertia-=(1<<4);
00379    else xinertia-=(1<<3);
00380    pwalkincreasetimer=0;
00381   }
00382   else pwalkincreasetimer++;
00383   
00384   // prevent sliding on map
00385   if ( m_playingmode == WORLDMAP )
00386   {
00387    if(xinertia > 0)  xinertia = 0;
00388    else xinertia = playcontrol[PA_X]*PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed/150;
00389   }
00390   
00391   // decrease down to max speed every time frame is changed
00392   if (!pwalkanimtimer && xinertia > -pmaxspeed) xinertia-=(1<<4);
00393  }
00394  
00395  if (playcontrol[PA_Y] > 0)
00396  {
00397   // quickly reach PFASTINCMAXSPEED
00398   if (pwalkincreasetimer>=PFASTINCRATE && pinertia_y<PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed)
00399   {
00400    pinertia_y++;
00401    pwalkincreasetimer=0;
00402   }
00403   else
00404   {
00405    pwalkincreasetimer++;
00406   }
00407   // increase up to max speed every time frame is changed
00408   if (!pwalkanimtimer && pinertia_y<pmaxspeed)
00409   {
00410    pinertia_y++;
00411   }
00412   
00413   // prevent sliding on map
00414   if ( m_playingmode == WORLDMAP )
00415   {
00416    if(pinertia_y < 0)
00417    {
00418     pinertia_y = 0;
00419    }
00420    else
00421    {
00422     pinertia_y=playcontrol[PA_Y]*PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed/150;
00423    }
00424   }
00425   
00426  }
00427  else if (playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0)
00428  {
00429   // quickly reach PFASTINCMAXSPEED
00430   if (pwalkincreasetimer>=PFASTINCRATE && pinertia_y>-PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed)
00431   {
00432    pinertia_y--;
00433    pwalkincreasetimer=0;
00434   }
00435   else
00436   {
00437    pwalkincreasetimer++;
00438   }
00439   // increase up to max speed every time frame is changed
00440   if (!pwalkanimtimer && pinertia_y>-pmaxspeed)
00441   {
00442    pinertia_y--;
00443   }
00444   
00445   // prevent sliding on map
00446   if ( m_playingmode == WORLDMAP )
00447   {
00448    if(pinertia_y > 0)
00449    {
00450     pinertia_y = 0;
00451    }
00452    else
00453    {
00454     pinertia_y=playcontrol[PA_Y]*PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed/150;
00455    }
00456   }
00457  }
00458 }
00459 
00460 // animation for walking
00461 void CPlayer::WalkingAnimation()
00462 {
00463  if(pfrozentime)
00464   return;
00465 
00466     // no walk animation while sliding
00467     if (inhibitwalking || psliding ) return;
00468  
00469     // should we do walk animation?
00470     if (pwalking  || psemisliding)
00471     {
00472      int walkanimrate; // walk animation speed according to player speed
00473   
00474      if(!psemisliding) {
00475       walkanimrate = 101*PWALKANIMRATE/(treshold+1);
00476          if(walkanimrate > 150)
00477     walkanimrate = 150;
00478      }
00479      else if(xinertia!=0) {
00480       walkanimrate = PWALKANIMRATE;
00481      }
00482      else {
00483       pwalkframe = 0;
00484       return;
00485      }
00486   
00487      // ** do walk animation **
00488         if (pwalkanimtimer > walkanimrate)
00489         {   // time to change walking frame
00490    // make walk noise
00491    if ( (!pjumping && !pfalling) || m_playingmode == WORLDMAP )
00492    {
00493     if (!pfrozentime && pwalking)
00494     {
00495      if (pwalkframea&1)
00496       g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_WALK, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00497      else
00498       g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_WALK2, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00499      
00500      if( m_playingmode != WORLDMAP && (blockedr || blockedl) )
00501      {
00502       g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_BUMPHEAD, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00503       // It is not bumping a head, but walking in some direction and being blocked
00504      }
00505      else if ( m_playingmode == WORLDMAP )
00506      {
00507       // Same on world map!
00508       bool play=false;
00509       play |= (blockedu && pdir == UP);
00510       play |= (blockedd && pdir == DOWN);
00511       play |= (blockedl && pdir == LEFT);
00512       play |= (blockedr && pdir == RIGHT);
00513       
00514       if (play)
00515        g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_BUMPHEAD, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00516      }
00517      
00518     }
00519    }
00520    // increase walk frame and wrap it to 1st frame if needed
00521    if (pwalkframea < 4)
00522             { pwalkframea++; }
00523    else
00524             { pwalkframea=1; }
00525    
00526    pwalkanimtimer = 0;
00527         }
00528         else
00529         {  // did not change walk frame
00530    pwalkanimtimer++;
00531         }
00532   
00533         // set walk frame: map frame "4" to frame "2", this gives a
00534         // sequence of 1,2,3,2,1,2,3,2,1,2,3,2....
00535         if (pwalkframea==4)
00536         {
00537    pwalkframe = 2;
00538         }
00539         else
00540         {
00541    pwalkframe = pwalkframea;
00542         }
00543     }
00544 }
00545 
00546 // handles inertia and friction for the X direction
00547 // (this is where the xinertia is actually applied to playx)
00548 void CPlayer::InertiaAndFriction_X()
00549 {
00550  int friction_rate;
00551  treshold = 0;
00552  CPhysicsSettings &PhysicsSettings = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00553 
00554  // Calculate Threshold of your analog device for walking animation speed!
00555  if(!pfrozentime)
00556  {
00557   treshold = playcontrol[PA_X];
00558 
00559   int pmaxspeed;
00560   int pmaxmovespeed = PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed;
00561 
00562 
00563   if( (!pjumping && !pfalling &&
00564     !psemisliding && !psliding && !ppogostick && !pslowingdown) || m_playingmode==WORLDMAP )
00565   {
00566    if(treshold < playcontrol[PA_Y] && playcontrol[PA_Y] > 0 )
00567     treshold = playcontrol[PA_Y];
00568 
00569    if(treshold > playcontrol[PA_Y] && playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0 )
00570     treshold = playcontrol[PA_Y];
00571 
00572    if(treshold < 0)
00573     treshold *= (-1);
00574   }
00575   else treshold = 100;
00576 
00577   pmaxspeed = treshold*pmaxmovespeed/100;
00578 
00579   if(xinertia > pmaxspeed)
00580    xinertia = pmaxspeed;
00581   if(xinertia < -pmaxspeed)
00582    xinertia = -pmaxspeed;
00583  }
00584 
00585  if(m_level == 80) // We are on World map
00586   verifySolidLevels();
00587  
00588  // apply xinertia
00589  // (unless we're about to make a pogo jump)
00590  if ( pjumping != PPREPAREPOGO && pjumping != PPREPAREJUMP)
00591  {
00592   int dx=xinertia;
00593   // check first if the player is not blocked
00594   if( (!blockedr and dx>0) or (!blockedl and dx<0) )
00595    moveXDir(dx);
00596   else
00597    xinertia = 0;
00598  }
00599  
00600  // if we stopped walking (i.e. left or right not held down) apply friction
00601  // there's no friction if we're semisliding
00602 
00603  if (!(playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) && !(playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) &&
00604   !psemisliding)
00605  {
00606   // determine friction rate--different rates for on ground and in air
00607   if (m_playingmode == WORLDMAP)
00608   {
00609    friction_rate = PFRICTION_RATE_WM;
00610   }
00611   else
00612   {
00613          if (!pfalling && !pjumping)
00614          {
00615     friction_rate = PFRICTION_RATE_ONGROUND;
00616          }
00617          else
00618          {
00619     friction_rate = PFRICTION_RATE_INAIR;
00620          }
00621   }
00622   
00623   // and apply friction to xinertia
00624   // when pogoing apply friction till we get down to PFASTINCMAXSPEED
00625   // then stop the friction
00626   if (!ppogostick || (xinertia >  PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed) ||
00627          (xinertia < -PhysicsSettings.player.max_x_speed) )
00628   {
00629    if (!pfrozentime || m_episode!=1)
00630    {   // disable friction while frozen
00631     // here the wall animation must be applied!
00632     if(!psliding)
00633      decreaseXInertia(friction_rate);
00634    }
00635   }
00636  }
00637 }
00638 
00639 // handles inertia and friction for the Y direction
00640 // (this is where the inertia is actually applied to playx)
00641 void CPlayer::InertiaAndFriction_Y()
00642 {
00643  if (hideplayer)
00644  {
00645   pinertia_y = 0;
00646   return;
00647  }
00648  
00649  // if we hit a solid object kill all inertia
00650  if (pinertia_y > 0 && blockedd)
00651   pinertia_y = 0;
00652  else if (pinertia_y < 0 && blockedu)
00653   pinertia_y = 0;
00654  else if( isWMSolid(getXMidPos(), getYMidPos()) )
00655   pinertia_y = 0;
00656  
00657  // check first if the player is not blocked by a level
00658  verifySolidLevels();
00659 
00660  // then apply pinertia_y
00661  if( (!blockedu && pinertia_y<0) || (!blockedd && pinertia_y>0) )
00662   moveYDir(pinertia_y);
00663  
00664  // if we stopped walking (i.e. LRUD not held down) apply friction
00665     if (playcontrol[PA_Y] == 0)
00666     {
00667   // and apply friction to pinertia_y
00668   if (pinertia_y < 0)
00669   {
00670    pinertia_y += PFRICTION_RATE_WM<<4;
00671    if(pinertia_y > 0) pinertia_y = 0;
00672   }
00673   else if (pinertia_y > 0)
00674   {
00675    pinertia_y -= PFRICTION_RATE_WM<<4;
00676    if(pinertia_y < 0) pinertia_y = 0;
00677   }
00678     }
00679 }
00680 
00681 /**
00682  * \brief Everything the player controls is processed here!
00683  */
00684 void CPlayer::ProcessInput()
00685 {
00686  // Entry for every player
00687  playcontrol[PA_X] = 0;
00688  playcontrol[PA_Y] = 0;
00689  
00690  if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_LEFT))
00691   playcontrol[PA_X] -= 100;
00692  else if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_RIGHT))
00693   playcontrol[PA_X] += 100;
00694  
00695  if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_DOWN))
00696   playcontrol[PA_Y] += 100;
00697  else if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_UP))
00698   playcontrol[PA_Y] -= 100;
00699 
00700  if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_UPPERLEFT))
00701  {
00702   playcontrol[PA_X] -= 100;
00703   playcontrol[PA_Y] -= 100;
00704  }
00705  else if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_UPPERRIGHT))
00706  {
00707   playcontrol[PA_X] += 100;
00708   playcontrol[PA_Y] -= 100;
00709  }
00710  else if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_LOWERLEFT))
00711  {
00712   playcontrol[PA_X] -= 100;
00713   playcontrol[PA_Y] += 100;
00714  }
00715  else if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_LOWERRIGHT))
00716  {
00717   playcontrol[PA_X] += 100;
00718   playcontrol[PA_Y] += 100;
00719  }
00720 
00721  
00722  if(!pfiring)
00723  {
00724   if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_JUMP))
00725    playcontrol[PA_JUMP]++;
00726   else
00727    playcontrol[PA_JUMP] = 0;
00728 
00729   playcontrol[PA_POGO]   = g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_POGO)   ? 1 : 0;
00730  }
00731 
00732  playcontrol[PA_FIRE]   = g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_FIRE)   ? 1 : 0;
00733  playcontrol[PA_STATUS] = g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_STATUS) ? 1 : 0;
00734  
00735  // The possibility to charge jumps. This is mainly used for the pogo.
00736  if( playcontrol[PA_JUMP] > 50) playcontrol[PA_JUMP] = 50;
00737  
00738  if(g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_index))
00739  {
00740   if(playcontrol[PA_FIRE])
00741   {
00742    playcontrol[PA_FIRE] = 0;
00743   }
00744   else if(playcontrol[PA_JUMP] && playcontrol[PA_POGO])
00745   {
00746    playcontrol[PA_FIRE] = 1;
00747    playcontrol[PA_JUMP] = 0;
00748    playcontrol[PA_POGO] = 0;
00749   }
00750  }
00751 }
00752 
00753 /**
00754  * \brief This function is processed while Keen is walking through the exit-door.
00755  */
00756 void CPlayer::ProcessExitLevel()
00757 {
00758  inhibitfall = true;
00759  ankhtime = 0;
00760  if (level_done==LEVEL_DONE_WALK)
00761  {
00762   walkbehindexitdoor();
00763 
00764         // keep him going right
00765         pdir = pshowdir = RIGHT;
00766         // make keen walk slowly through the exit door
00767         playcontrol[PA_X] = 80;
00768         if (xinertia > PMAXEXITDOORSPEED)
00769         {
00770          xinertia = PMAXEXITDOORSPEED;
00771         }
00772  }
00773  else
00774  {
00775         // he's all the way through the door; hold him still
00776   xinertia = 0;
00777         pwalking = false;
00778  }
00779 
00780  if (level_done_timer > LEVEL_DONE_TOTAL_WAIT_TIME)
00781  {
00782   // Now, that the level is complete, sprite can be shown again, and now goto map!
00783   int width = w>>(CSF-4);
00784   int frame = playerbaseframe;
00785   if(m_episode == 3) frame++;
00786 
00787   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(frame+0).setWidth(width);
00788   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(frame+1).setWidth(width);
00789   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(frame+2).setWidth(width);
00790   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(frame+3).setWidth(width);
00791 
00792   level_done_timer = 0;
00793   level_done = LEVEL_COMPLETE;
00794   for(size_t i = 0 ; i<4 ; i++)
00795    inventory.canlooseitem[i] = false;
00796  }
00797  else if (level_done_timer > LEVEL_DONE_STOPWALKING_TIME)
00798   level_done = LEVEL_DONE_WAIT;
00799 
00800  level_done_timer++;
00801 }
00802 
00803 void CPlayer::StatusBox()
00804 {
00805  if( g_pInput->getPressedCommand(m_index, IC_STATUS) && !level_done )
00806   m_showStatusScreen=true; // PlayGame class detects that variable and launches drawStatusScreen()
00807 }
00808 
00809 void CPlayer::freeze()
00810 {
00811  if ( godmode ) return;
00812  if ( ankhtime ) return;
00813  // give the player a little "kick"
00814 
00815  CPhysicsSettings &PhysicsSettings = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00816 
00817  pjumpupspeed = PhysicsSettings.player.maxjumpspeed;
00818 
00819  pjumping = PJUMPUP;
00820  pjustjumped = true;
00821 
00822  // and freeze him (stun him on ep2/3)
00823  pfrozentime = PFROZEN_TIME;
00824  pfrozenframe = 0;
00825  pfrozenanimtimer = 0;
00826  ppogostick = false;
00827  playcontrol[PA_X] = 0;
00828 }
00829 
00830 bool CPlayer::checkObjSolid()
00831 {
00832  supportedbyobject = false;
00833 
00834  std::vector<CObject*>::iterator it_obj = mp_object->begin();
00835  for( ; it_obj != mp_object->end() ; it_obj++ )
00836  {
00837   if((*it_obj)->cansupportplayer)
00838   { // can support player
00839    if(getXRightPos() >= (*it_obj)->getXLeftPos()  &&
00840      getXLeftPos() <= (*it_obj)->getXRightPos() )
00841    {
00842     if(getYUpPos() <= (*it_obj)->getYDownPos()+(1<<STC)  &&
00843      getYUpPos() >= (*it_obj)->getYMidPos() )
00844     { // In this case the object pushs the player down!
00845      pjumping = PNOJUMP;
00846      int dy = (*it_obj)->getYDownPos() - getYUpPos();
00847      //supportedbyobject = true;
00848      blockedu = true;
00849      moveDown(dy);
00850     }
00851     else if(getYDownPos() >= (*it_obj)->getYUpPos()-(3<<STC)  &&
00852       getYDownPos() <= (*it_obj)->getYMidPos() )
00853     { // In this case stand on the object
00854      pfalling = false;
00855      if(pjumping == PJUMPLAND)
00856       pjumping = PNOJUMP;
00857      supportedbyobject = true;
00858      psupportingobject = (*it_obj)->m_index;
00859      int dy = (*it_obj)->getYUpPos() - getYDownPos()+1;
00860      if(pjumping == PNOJUMP)
00861       moveYDir(dy);
00862      blockedd = true;
00863      break;
00864     }
00865    }
00866   }
00867  }
00868  return true;
00869 }
00870 
00871 // Draws the Status screen and return false, when it's still open.
00872 bool CPlayer::drawStatusScreen()
00873 {
00874  if(m_showStatusScreen)
00875  {
00876   if(mp_StatusScr == NULL)
00877    mp_StatusScr = new CStatusScreen(m_episode, &inventory, mp_levels_completed, ankhtime, playerbaseframe);
00878   
00879   mp_StatusScr->draw();
00880   
00881   if( mp_StatusScr->isClosed() )
00882   {
00883    m_showStatusScreen = false;
00884    delete mp_StatusScr;
00885    mp_StatusScr = NULL;
00886   }
00887   else if( g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand() )
00888   {
00889    mp_StatusScr->close();
00890   }
00891   return false;
00892  }
00893  else return true;
00894 }

00898 // Cleanup Part
00899 ///
00900 CPlayer::~CPlayer() {
00901  m_playerID--;
00902 }
